Service Details: - Supports people who stutter and their families with a variety of programs, financial assistance for therapy, support groups, and information resources- Encourages, facilitates, and assists support groups for people who stutter - Lends books regarding stuttering to people who stutter - Works to increase the awareness of stuttering as an issue affecting members of society - Has an annual camp where people of all ages get together and share their experiences every summer - Organizes an annual International Stuttering Awareness Day event every October with speakers and workshops - Provides limited financial assistance to those with a demonstrated need to obtain stuttering therapy - Offers referral and information services for people who stutter - Networks with other stuttering organizations and therapy clinics to increase the flow of information on stuttering and services - Provides educational resources for professionals who support people who stutter
Address & Map: 8582 Flowering PlBurnaby, BC     V5A 4B4View MapQuest Map
